title: Codehere
description: Codehere is a local community of amazing individuals who have a keen interest in technology, coding and tinkering. The community is driven towards improving knowledge and skills relating to technology and its domain.

intro.heading:
**We love** people..
who **love to code**
intro.paragraph:
**Discover** people, **share** your projects, **get help**
with your projects and more...

about.heading: About the community
about.paragraph: **Codehere** is a local community of amazing individuals who have a keen interest in technology, coding and tinkering. The community is driven towards improving knowledge and skills relating to technology and its domain.

projects.heading: Share and Collaborate on projects
projects.paragraph: Have an idea worth implementing? Need some help? Share your projects with the community and find like minded individuals to collaborate with. Get tips from more experienced people or better yet help others on their projects.

discover_people.heading: Discover people with common interest
discover_people.paragraph: Like programming? Robotics? Web Development? Find people with similar interest and start chatting. Come and be a part of the community.

get_help.heading: Get help
get_help.paragraph: Unable to find solution to your problem? Stackoverflow seems daunting? Share your problem to a fresh set of eyes. We all need help. Help and get help.
